Detailed Description

Singleton object that owns and starts the Omicron runtime.

Member Function Documentation

static bool omi::runtime::Engine::cycle_static ( )
static

Performs a cycle of execution of the Omicron engine.

Is called by the input subsystem.

int omi::runtime::Engine::execute ( )

Begins execution of Omicron.

Control is only returned from this function once Omicron exits.

bool omi::runtime::Engine::cycle ( )

Performs a cycle of execution of the Omicron engine.

Is called by the cycle_static function.
